version_description:
This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Greetings Spinjitzu masters! We’ve harnessed the elements to improve the player experience with fixes including:
• Controller support!
• A dedicated Spinjitzu button for even easier special attacks
• iCloud saves now work across multiple devices
• Fixed language issues
